question: I am going to read you a list of things people do on cell phones, other than making calls. For each, please tell me if this is something you do regularly or not?...Send text messages

0.raw_output:
I frequently send text messages on my cell phone as it is a quick and convenient way to communicate with friends, family, and colleagues. This activity has become a regular part of my daily routine, so I would choose the option indicating I do this regularly.

ANSWER: A
